title: Demotion
body:
Hey I heard that when u about to be demote it have a red messege show up right? and i have to reach 0 and lose 3 games for demotion to happen right?
This is the second time i got demote and no red mark or warning :( Can someone help?

replies.body:
Hi ApolloniusA,

There might be a bit of a misconception here.  For demotion due to decay, there are notifications that appear in your client warning you of how much time you have left.  For normal demotions however, there is no set warning system for this.  If you consistently lose games while at zero LP, you have a chance of being demoted.  

I hope this helps!  If you have any other lingering questions, feel free to respond back and let me know!
